main event: An unidentified flying object was observed hovering and moving back and forth in Greensburg, Pennsylvania on June 29, 1965.
interesting points: The object was approximately the size of a football and emitted a soft, glowing light., The object appeared to be adjustable, dimming and changing size during the observation., The witness noted that the object had no blinking lights and did not account for speed and altitude., The observation lasted for several minutes and was done visually from the ground., The sighting occurred in the evening with slightly cloudy conditions, and the object passed silently to the south.
sighted object: a glowing object the size of a football
witness description: The witness described seeing the object from a garage roof and noted that it emitted bright lights and made no sound.
